CustomField.formula: IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryAddressLine1__c), PrimaryAddressLine1__c & BR(), "") & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryAddressLine2__c), PrimaryAddressLine2__c & BR(), "") & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryAddressLine3__c), PrimaryAddressLine3__c & BR(), "") & IF( (!ISBLANK(PrimaryCity__c)&& !ISBLANK(PrimaryZipCode__c)), PrimaryCity__c &", " & PrimaryZipCode__c & BR(), IF( (ISBLANK(PrimaryCity__c)&& !ISBLANK(PrimaryZipCode__c)) , PrimaryZipCode__c & BR(), IF( (!ISBLANK(PrimaryCity__c)&& ISBLANK(PrimaryZipCode__c)) , PrimaryCity__c & BR(), ""))) & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryStateProvince__c), PrimaryStateProvince__c & BR(), "") & IF( !ISBLANK(PrimaryCountry__c), PrimaryCountry__c & BR(), "")
CustomField.label: Primary Address
